dcterms:creator: C. Gardent
A. Shimorina
S. Narayan
L. Perez-Beltrachini
dcterms:description: The WebNLG Challenge 2017 consists of 25,298 (data,text) pairs with 14 categories, which can be divided into nine 'Seen' categories and five 'Unseen' categories. The model takes Resource Description Framework (RDF) triples as inputs and generates natural text descriptions to perform data-to-text generation task.
dcterms:title: WebNLG Challenge 2017

dcterms:creator: L. Nan
D. R. Radev
R. Zhang
A. Rau
A. Sivaprasad
C. Hsieh
X. Tang
A. Vyas
N. Verma
P. Krishna
dcterms:description: DART is an open-domain text generation dataset with 82k examples, which are extracted from several datasets including WebNLG 2017 and Cleaned E2E.
dcterms:title: DART

dcterms:creator: J. Novikova
O. Du≈°ek
V. Rieser
dcterms:description: The E2E dataset consists of about 50k instances that provide meaning representations (MRs) and references for inference in the restaurant domain. Language models should perform data-to-text generation using suggested MRs.
dcterms:title: E2E

dcterms:creator: A. Wang
A. Singh
J. Michael
F. Hill
O. Levy
S. R. Bowman
dcterms:description: MNLI evaluates the sentence understanding performance. Given a pair of premise and hypothesis, the main task is to classify the relationship between the two sentences into one of entailment, contradiction, and neutral.
dcterms:title: MNLI

dcterms:creator: B. Gliwa
I. Mochol
M. Biesek
A. Wawer
dcterms:description: SAMSum is a conversation dataset containing 16k summaries. Given a dialog, the goal is to generate summarizations to evaluate dialog understanding and natural language generation capabilities.
dcterms:title: SAMSum
